Reviews.Content: Don't go! It looked more like a cheap motel--like the ones you rent by the hour. On the phone they said that one could walk to the beach, and of course you could if you walk for a few hours! They didn't even have the room rate I had reserved and wanted to charge us for the upgrade.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
